SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Network.Messages.toClientMessages

Class gameInfoMsg

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Network.Message
it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Network.Messages.toClientMessages.gameInfoMsg
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class gameInfoMsg extends Message
This message is sent from the server to the client when the game state has changed. In particular, after a turn has been played or after a game has been loaded successfully and all the players have rejoined.
See Also:

      public gameInfoMsg(int playerID, int[] scores, PlayableCard onGround, int lastOnGroundIndex, CardSide placedCardSide, CardSide goldenDeckTop, CardSide resourceDeckTop)
      Constructor of the message.
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player who last played
      scores - the scores of all the players
      onGround - the new card on the ground
      lastOnGroundIndex - the index of the new card on the ground
      placedCardSide - the CardSide that has been placed by the player
      goldenDeckTop - the backside of the card on top of the gold deck
      resourceDeckTop - the backside of the card on top of the resource deck
